mapper.select: SELECT b.book_idx, SUBSTRING(b.book_title, 1, 12) AS book_title, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(book_contents, '\r\n', ''), 1, 15) AS book_contents, t.tag_content, b.user_idx, u.user_local, f.stored_file_path, b.hit_cnt, b.create_date, u.user_name FROM book b JOIN tag t ON b.detail_category = t.tag_idx JOIN book_file f ON b.book_idx = f.book_idx JOIN user u ON b.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE b.deleted_yn = 'N' AND f.deleted_yn = 'N' AND ( b.book_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR b.book_contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR t.tag_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR u.user_local LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') OR u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') ) GROUP BY b.book_title ORDER BY b.create_date DESC;
